post.title: Back to Twitter. Loving Plurk.
post.content:
welcome to follow my twitter and plurk @sychopx.

i’m reborn on twitter and fresh new to plurk. i’m lovin’ plurk! from my point of view, plurk is more about life, twitter is more geek, about technologies/linux/gfw…dark sides of almost everything, much more aggressive. i like the taiwanese on plurk. plurk is designed very friendly for life-sharing. so most of my tweets now will be updated through plurk. @liangsuilong once told me many people switch from plurk to twitter. well, i’m the opposite! i’m sure anyone who experienced plurk will fall in love with it! it’s warmer, and cooler in a way.

btw, @xsoul doesn’t exist anymore. ur gonna see the new me @sychopx! & i kinda miss my twitter friends… thank you all for your support.
